SELECT mbr.id as memBankRelationId, mbr.mem_id ,mb.account,mb.real_name,mbk.`name` as bankName, mbr.bank_id , mbr.bank_card , mbr.account_opening_address, mbr.`status`,mbr.create_time FROM mem_bank_relation mbr LEFT JOIN mem_baseinfo mb on mb.id = mbr.mem_id LEFT JOIN mem_bank mbk on mbk.id = mbr.bank_id
and mb.account like concat('%', #{dto.keywords,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, '%')
and mb.real_name like concat('%', #{dto.keywords,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, '%')
and mbr.bank_card like concat('%', #{dto.keywords,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, '%')
and mb.Identity_type = #{dto.memType}
and date_format(mb.create_time,'%y%m%d') >= date_format(#{dto.beginTime},'%y%m%d')
and date_format(mb.create_time,'%y%m%d') <= date_format(#{dto.endTime},'%y%m%d')
ORDER BY mb.create_time desc
